title: Distribution of democracy index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by the [Economist Intelligence Unit (2006-2024)](#dod:economist-intelligence-unit), weighted by countries' populations. It combines information on the extent to which citizens can choose their political leaders in free and fair elections, enjoy civil liberties, prefer democracy over other political systems, can and do participate in politics, and have a functioning government that acts on their behalf. It ranges from 0 to 10 (most democratic).
